document.heading: Police Officers, Fire Fighters, and Teachers Retirement Benefit Replacement Act of 1998 Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-308, the “Police Officers, Fire Fighters, and Teachers Retirement Benefit Replacement Act of 1998 Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-1018. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Feb. 11, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-675 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-308 became effective on May 1, 2013.
